text.jpText: 視界全部奪うような 打ちつけるスコールの中でも
text.enText: I cannot see ahead of myself  In this endless squall beating down on me

text.jpText: きっとさらわれ流れるのは 言い訳と迷いだけよ
text.enText: But all that it can sweep away is just my  Excuses and hesitation

text.jpText: ぬかるんだ現状に足をとられて
text.enText: The muddy ground may try to bind my feet

text.jpText: 陰鬱な空気が喉ふさいでも
text.enText: The gloomy air may try to halt my breath

text.jpText: この声は絶やせないでしょう この足は止まらないでしょう
text.enText: But my voice will never cease to resonate  My feet will never cease to carry me
As long as I am alive

text.jpText: どうか全力で射抜いてよ 瞳で私を
text.enText: Stare straight at me like you're trying to   Pierce me through with your eyes

text.jpText: 焼き付けていこう それは約束の進化系
text.enText: Let me burn myself into them  This renewed form that I promised you

text.jpText: 傷を痛がって投げ出す程度の思いじゃない
text.enText: I'm not so weak as to throw it all away because of the pain I feel
I'll show you all of my EVOLUTION
